description: MainActivity.kt defines the main activity for a simple number guessing game Android application. It manages game state, user input, and UI updates, including generating random numbers, handling guesses, and restarting the game.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity class managing the number guessing game, including game logic, UI interactions, and state management.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the UI, binds event handlers, and starts the game.

methods.name: generateRandomNumber
methods.description: Generates a new random number between 1 and 10 for the game.

methods.name: updateScore
methods.description: Updates the score display with the current score.
